abstract: The hedge fund that helped defeat Dynegy’s previous plan to sell itself accused the company of recklessly jumping into a marginally better deal with Carl Icahn.
snippet: The hedge fund that helped defeat Dynegy’s previous plan to sell itself accused the company of recklessly jumping into a marginally better deal with Carl Icahn.
lead_paragraph: A new fight is brewing over the proposed sale of Dynegy — and it’s between two erstwhile allies.

headline.main: New Fight at Dynegy as Seneca Takes On Icahn

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
